actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 1995

summary.text: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 1995 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.

titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 1995
A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
